pansTrinkets:BagOfDaggers.NAME: Bag Of Daggers
pansTrinkets:BagOfDaggers.DESCRIPTION: panstrinkets:Quickdraw. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Return this card to your draw pile.
pansTrinkets:BagOfDaggers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: panstrinkets:Quickdraw. Retain. NL Exhaust all status cards in your hand, draw pile and discard pile.

pansTrinkets:SoothingBalm.NAME: Soothing Balm
pansTrinkets:SoothingBalm.DESCRIPTION: panstrinkets:Quickdraw. NL Exhaust ALL your Status cards.
pansTrinkets:SoothingBalm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL panstrinkets:Quickdraw. NL Exhaust ALL your status cards.

pansTrinkets:GoldenFeather.NAME: Golden Feather
pansTrinkets:GoldenFeather.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your draw pile OR your discard pile for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.
pansTrinkets:GoldenFeather.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand, and in your draw pile OR your discard pile for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.

pansTrinkets:FromBelow.NAME: From Below
pansTrinkets:FromBelow.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your discard pile for the rest of combat.

pansTrinkets:RiseAbove.NAME: Rise Above
pansTrinkets:RiseAbove.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your draw pile for the rest of combat.

pansTrinkets:SapphireLocket.NAME: Sapphire Locket
pansTrinkets:SapphireLocket.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL Draw a random power from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
pansTrinkets:SapphireLocket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL panstrinkets:Quickdraw. NL Draw a random power from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

pansTrinkets:SealedBox.NAME: Sealed Box
pansTrinkets:SealedBox.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold. NL Remove this card from your deck.

pansTrinkets:OrnateMirror.NAME: Ornate Mirror
pansTrinkets:OrnateMirror.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Place one copy of it in your hand. NL Exhaust.
pansTrinkets:OrnateMirror.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Place copy of it in your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

pansTrinkets:ExplosiveTrap.NAME: Explosive Trap
pansTrinkets:ExplosiveTrap.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL Next time you take damage, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

pansTrinkets:Kaleidoscope.NAME: Kaleidoscope
pansTrinkets:Kaleidoscope.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random panstrinkets:Illusory card of any color in your hand.

pansTrinkets:UniversalDictionary.NAME: Universal Dictionary
pansTrinkets:UniversalDictionary.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: panstrinkets:Large. NL Draw cards until your hand is full.

pansTrinkets:AmorphousMatter.NAME: Amorphous Matter
pansTrinkets:AmorphousMatter.DESCRIPTION: Choose a random trinket to add to your hand. It is panstrinkets:Illusory.
pansTrinkets:AmorphousMatter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a random trinket to add to your hand. It is panstrinkets:Illusory and Upgraded.

pansTrinkets:FangHammer.NAME: Fang Hammer
pansTrinkets:FangHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, heal HP equal to unblocked damage dealt.

pansTrinkets:CrystalBall.NAME: Crystal Ball
pansTrinkets:CrystalBall.DESCRIPTION: Innate. panstrinkets:Large. NL Scry your entire draw pile. Add !M! Dazed in your draw pile.

pansTrinkets:HungryCoin.NAME: Hungry Coin
pansTrinkets:HungryCoin.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Gold. Deal !D! damage. Permanently increase this card's damage and gold cost by 3.
pansTrinkets:HungryCoin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Gold. Deal !D! damage. Permanently increase this card's damage and gold cost by 5.

pansTrinkets:RunicBoomerang.NAME: Runic Boomerang
pansTrinkets:RunicBoomerang.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play goes back to your hand.
pansTrinkets:RunicBoomerang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next 2 cards you play go back to your hand.

pansTrinkets:MirrorShield.NAME: Mirror Shield
pansTrinkets:MirrorShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust

pansTrinkets:ThePlan.NAME: The Plan
pansTrinkets:ThePlan.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL They are Retained this turn.

pansTrinkets:OrichalcumArmor.NAME: Orichalcum Armor
pansTrinkets:OrichalcumArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is in your deck, gain !M! Block at the end of your turn.

pansTrinkets:DarkRuby.NAME: Dark Ruby
pansTrinkets:DarkRuby.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Add a Void to your discard pile.

pansTrinkets:CorruptedIdol.NAME: Corrupted Idol
pansTrinkets:CorruptedIdol.DESCRIPTION: While this is in your deck, you have 20 more Max HP. NL Exhaust.
